body_html: Okay, yes, this was related to the parameters growing very large, because my intended step where I project them back wasn't working. Now that I'm doing that properly, this no longer happens, and this minimized version is uninteresting. Will see if it totally fixes the big version (other than #2563)....

body: Okay, yes, this was related to the parameters growing very large, because my intended step where I project them back wasn't working. Now that I'm doing that properly, this no longer happens, and this minimized version is uninteresting. Will see if it totally fixes the big version (other than #2563)....
